name: assignee_sequence
description: order in which assignee appears in patent file; sequence for this table begins at {1}.

name: assignee_id
description: unique assignee ID generated by the disambiguation algorithm

name: raw_assignee_individual_name_first
description: first name, if assignee is individual

name: raw_assignee_individual_name_last
description: last name, if assignee is individual

name: raw_assignee_organization
description: organization name if assignee is organization

name: assignee_type
description: assignee type (1- Unassigned, 2 - US Company or Corporation, 3 - Foreign Company or Corporation, 4 - US Individual, 5 - Foreign Individual, 6 - US Federal Government, 7 - Foreign Government, 8 - US County Government, 9 - US State Government. Note: A "1" appearing before any of these codes signifies part interest)

name: rawlocation_id
description: assignee's location. If the assignee's sequence number is 1, then his/her location is the "location" of the related patent
